## Hello!

I am Wyara, welcome to my website!

I am a statistician, and I'm currently pursuing a Doctoral Degree in Statistics from the Graduate Program in Statistics at UFMG.

In this website I will share some notes, tests, codes and other things that I did and I will do during my academic life.

I am addicted to coffee, passionate about cinema and also I am orange belt in karate. Osu.
